msbt.message: Hey, happy Bunny Day! You know, today's an awesome chance to put your agility training to the test.There are eggs hidden EVERYWHERE. Up in trees, in the river, you name it!
I tried asking Zipper how he trained to do all that dancing in his costume without passing out from the heat.He told me it wasn't a costume and to quit asking, .
I gotta be more careful about eating those Bunny Day candy eggs.The rush is great for digging up a tree or getting some extra reps in But that sugar crash is brutal!
I saw one of those colorful balloons floating by. Even with my world-class vertical leap I still couldn't reach it.I really want to see one up close though Maybe I could shoot one down somehow, ?

I was doing aerobics on the beach earlier and spotted a weirdly colorful message bottle, .Opening bottles and jars is below my weight class though, so I just left it there. StillI wonder what's inside.

Bunny Day is the best. I mean, I get stone eggs just for hitting the rocks around here? I do that all the time!Oh, pro-tip! If you wanna find a whole lot of stone eggs, try going on a Nook Miles Ticket tour.Stone eggs are like free-range free weights, and those islands are the freest range there is, !

Want a tip that'll get you ripped AND help out your candy-egg hunt? Start hitting coconut trees.Coconut trees are extra stiff, so you'll get a solid arm workout, plus word is there's more eggs in 'em!
You been fishing lately? I went out earlier and ended up catching a Bunny Day egg instead of a fish!The egg still put up a serious fight though, so I'm gonna count that as my arm workout for the day.
